p.span: I am honored to serve in the capacity of Superintendent of Tucker County Schools in a community for which I have such great love and admiration.
To me, there is no greater accomplishment than being able to give back to the school system that gave so much to me as a student, teacher and principal.

I am proud of the education I received from Tucker County Schools and look forward to continuing a strong educational foundation for our County’s youth. We have great educators, engaged parents and strong community partnerships. I am confident that we can continue to move our school system in the right direction. Through innovation, hard work and collaboration we will ensure that every student achieves their own success and leaves Tucker County Schools prepared for what lies ahead.

I look forward to the great work we, as a school system and community, can do for our kids today and for many years to come.
Sincerely,
